location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch Map of the Route of Lieutenants Sconce and Watson during the Salween expedition from December 1863, to April 1864'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:1600 x 1015 mm; on sheet 1643 x 1064 mmCondition:Some small tears along fold linesFoliation:The map has been foliated in the front top right hand corner of the folio with a pencil number enclosed in a circle.

mods.abstract: Imprint:O. T. Cutter, Military Orphan Press, 1864. Drawn by R H Dopoy, draftsman, Executive Engineers Office Department P.W. [private works] Moulmein Division.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.The map shows the route taken by the Salween Expedition through Burma [Myanmar] from Shoogheen [Shwegyin] along the Salween river and across to Mandaley. Signed by G Colquhoun Sconce, Lieutenant I.N. Salween Expedition.Route taken by authors shown by red line.
